name: discord-vscode
description: Update your discord status with the newly added rich presence.

commands.title: Enable Discord Presence in the current workspace
Disable Discord Presence in the current workspace

discord.clientID.description: Only modify this if you know what you are doing (most of you don't)

discord.enabled.description: Controls if the Discord Presence should show across all workspaces

discord.reconnectThreshold.description: Decides how many reconnect attempts should be made before stopping

discord.detailsEditing.description:
Custom string for the details section of the rich presence
	- '{null}' will be replaced with an empty space.
	- '{filename}' will be replaced with the current file name.
	- '{dirname}' will get replaced with the folder name that has the current file.
	- '{fulldirname}' will get replaced with the full directory name without the current file name.
	- '{workspace}' will be replaced with the current workspace name, if any.
	- '{currentcolumn}' will get replaced with the current column of the current line.
	- '{currentline}' will get replaced with the current line number.
	- '{totallines}' will get replaced with the total line number.
	- '{filesize}' will get replaced with the current file's size.

discord.lowerDetailsNotFound.description:
Custom string for the state section of the rich presence when no workspace is found.
If set to '{null}', this will be an empty space.
	- '{currentline}' will get replaced with the current line number.
	- '{totallines}' will get replaced with the total line number.
	- '{filesize}' will get replaced with the current file's size.

discord.largeImage.description:
Custom string for the largeImageText section of the rich presence.
	- '{lang}' will be replaced with the lowercased language ID
	- '{LANG}' will be replaced with the uppercased language ID

discord.largeImageIdle.description: Custom string for the largeImageText section of the rich presence when idling

discord.smallImage.description:
Custom string for the smallImageText section of the rich presence
	- '{appname}' will get replaced with the current Visual Studio Code version.

discord.silent.description: Decides if error messages are shown to the user

discord.workspaceElapsedTime.description: Decides whether to display elapsed time for a workspace or a single file
